title: Play poorly in 1 game.
body:
So.

I played really terribly in one game. I picked Singed because he is a badass. I get into game vsing a Darius. Ok i do the right thing play passive give up farm rather than deaths. 

We lose the game. Everyone lost lane on my team. No problem u lose lanes and games in league it happens daily no issue at all.

The post game lobby my team mate said the following.

"You're so bad why would you buy a boosted account." 

I was laughing sooo hard. Why would anyone buy a silver 1 account? Salt levels are high.

Anyone else had that bad a game recently?
